description: The objective of this Request for Proposal (RFP) is to select a vendor capable of providing turn-key Audio-Visual Services to CMHC on a national level.
full_summary:
## Audio-Visual Services
### Tender Notification

#### Tender Information

*  **Reference Number:** cb-7450-48168036
*  **Solicitation Number:** RFP002032
*  **Publication Date:** 2023-07-24
*  **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-08-07 at 14:00:00
*  **amendment Date:** 2023-08-07

#### Tender Description

The Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation (CMHC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for Audio-Visual Services. The selected vendor will provide turn-key audio-visual services nationally.

#### Solicitation Category

*  **Category:** SRV
*  **Type of Procurement:** Request for Proposal
*  **Method of Procurement:** Competitive – Open Bidding

#### Proposal Evaluation Criteria

The vendor will be selected based on a combined rating of technical merit and price.

#### Regions Affected

*  **Regions of Delivery:** British Columbia, Canada, Nunavut Territory, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Yukon, Alberta, Newfoundland and Labrador, Saskatchewan, Ontario (excluding the National Capital Region), Prince Edward Island, Quebec (excluding the National Capital Region), Northwest Territories, Indigenous Lands, Nova Scotia, and the National Capital Region.

#### Important Dates

*  **Expected Contract Commencement Date:** 2023-09-01
*  **Expected Contract End Date:** 2026-08-31

#### Contact Information

*  **Contact Name:** David LaBerge
*  **Contact Email:** [dlaberge@cmhc-schl.gc.ca](mailto:dlaberge@cmhc-schl.gc.ca)
*  **Contact Phone:** (613) 748-4794

#### Contract Documents

The tender documents including the RFP can be downloaded from [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/7450/rfp002032-audio-visual-services\_0.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/7450/rfp002032-audio-visual-services\_0.pdf)

Please note that this has not been officially certified by the government. The name of the contacting entity, which is the Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation, has been shortened to CMHC for better readable purpose.
